definitions: the quality of being fat or of heavy build

examples.text: the connection between diabetes and stoutness

definitions: the quality of being strong and thick

examples.text: they had left him unbound, trusting in the stoutness of the wooden walls that locked him in

shortDefinitions: quality of being strong and thick

definitions: the quality in a sports team of being strong or powerful

examples.text: he was concerned about France's stoutness in the center of the field

shortDefinitions: quality in sports team of being strong

examples.text: he set about his goal with admirable stoutness
